scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The five box Radford Student Handbooks collection contains handbooks issued to students at Radford College/University that would describe the various rules and regulations about student living and conduct. Over the years the handbooks would sometimes feature different names, but still functioned as handbooks. The collection is not complete or comprehensive, but includes all available issues when this collection was compiled in October 2012. The student handbook is now available online for students.
